Description: Custom Epiphone by Gibson SG Body Electric Bass Guitar w/ Hard Case Condition: Good project bass guitar. Good overall cosmetic condition with some, scuffs, scratches and residue on body as well as the headstock. Tuners, nut, neck, and fretboard are all in good condition. There is no bridge installed but mounting screws are in place. Neck appears to be straight. There is a truss rod in place. The electronics were tested by tapping the pickups and both respond. Hard travel case is included. New strings required. Measurements: Full Length: 45.5" Lower Bout: 13" Upper Bout: 10.5" Nut to saddle: 34.5" Notes: Please see photos for additional detail and feel free to ask questions.
